testsuite.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function
Below test cases are for send_notification with SMTP

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for send_notification with SMTP S-Bash-Util-0023. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-Util-0023. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for send_notification with SMTP S-Bash-Util-0024. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration and --attachments
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-Util-0024. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration and --attachments

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for send_notification with SMTP S-Bash-Util-0025. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration and --attach-logs true.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-Util-0025. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration and --attach-logs true.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for send_notification with SMTP S-Bash-Util-0026. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration and --show-failing-commands true
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-Util-0026. User can call send_notification with an SMTP integration and --show-failing-commands true

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases are for send_notification with SMTP S_Bash_Util_6107_0001. User will call send_notification with executable code (template injection) inside the email body, which contains a malicious code. This code will be sent as a string in the email and will not get executed. Step will be successful.
testcase.classclass: S_Bash_Util_6107_0001. User will call send_notification with executable code (template injection) inside the email body, which contains a malicious code. This code will be sent as a string in the email and will not get executed. Step will be successful.
